column1: 14.1:I can see you standin'
17.3:With his arms around your body
21.1:Laughin' but the joke's not funny at all
27.3:And it took you five whole minutes
31.1:To pack us up and leave me with it
34.2:Holdin' all this love out here in the hall
40.1:I think I've seen this film before
45.1:And I didn't like the ending
47.3:You're not my homeland anymore
52.1:So what am I defendin' now?
54.2:You were my town
56.2:Now I'm in exile seein' you out
61.2:I think I've seen this film before

84.0:Like he's just your understudy
87.1:Like you'd get your knuckles bloody for me

144.2:All this time
